main_definition: A woman who is attracted romantically or sexually to other women.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers specifically to the sexual orientation of a woman who has such feelings for another woman.
meanings_and_examples.example: Marina and Sophia are lesbians who have been in a relationship for five years.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A member of the LGBTQ+ community, particularly focusing on women who identify as attracted to other women.
meanings_and_examples.example: Lesbian rights organizations advocate for equal treatment and recognition under the law.
